title: Stay and Relax
description: Book your stay for 3 nights and get a complimentary massage at our spa

title: Family Getaway
description: Bring your family to our resort and enjoy a 50% discount on kids' meals and activities

title: Romantic Escape
description: Surprise your partner with a romantic getaway and receive a bottle of sparkling wine upon arrival

title: Adventure Package
description: Book your stay for 5 nights and get a free kayaking excursion for 2

title: Extended Stay
description: Book your stay for 7 nights and receive a discount of $100 on your room rate

title: Group Getaway
description: Book your stay with a group of 10 or more and receive a complimentary welcome drink upon arrival
